comments.author: Jaap Groen, OLVG
comments.description: Automatic deletion of studies in Orthanc

params.orthanc_user: username for the orthanc server if needed
params.orthanc_password: password for the orthanc server if needed
params.delete_after: minimal number of days between now and studydate
params.run_interval: minimal number of days between each deletion run
